deployment_history.ai_summary: Deployment shows critical memory leak. Error rate jumped to 35.4% within 3 minutes. OutOfMemoryError detected in logs. System health score: 28/100.

deployment_history.outcome: Service restored. Error rate dropped to 0.5%. Memory usage normalized to 45%.
